## Chess.put() method

Place a piece on a square. Fails when passed an invalid piece or square, or when two or more kings of the same color are placed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
put(piece: {
        type?: string;
        color?: string;
    }, square?: string): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  piece | { type?: string; color?: string; } | Object of the form <code>{ type: 'p', color: 'w' }</code> |
|  square | string | e.g. <code>'e4'</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if placed successfully, otherwise false
